Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Acid

Standard

Reach 4

+32 vs AC; 2d8+8 damage, and ongoing 15 acid damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 4

+32 vs AC; 1d10+8 damage.

At-Will

Standard

The dragon makes two claw attacks.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When a melee attack misses the dragon, at-will

The dragon uses its tail to attack the target; reach 4; targets the enemy that missed it; +32 vs AC; 1d12+10 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares.

Recharge 4-6 âœ¦ Acid, Zone

Standard

Close burst 2

Sustain Minor

This power creates a zone of acidic darkness that remains in place until the end of the dragon's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except the dragon. Any creature entirely within the area (except the dragon) is blinded, and any creature that enters or begins its turn in the zone takes 15 acid damage.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+28 vs Reflex; 4d8+6 acid damage, and the target takes ongoing 30 acid damage and takes a -4 penalty to AC (save ends both).

Encounter âœ¦ Acid

Free

Close blast 5

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +28 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will âœ¦ Acid

Standard

Close blast 5

+28 vs Reflex; 2d10+6 acid damage, and the target is blinded until the end of the dragon's next turn. Miss: Half damage, and the target is not blinded.
